Package org.svvrl.goal.core.util

Class Cache

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.util.Cache
public class Cache
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides an interface for caching files. Files for different classes will be stored in different folders. By default, the cached files remain in the disk after GOAL exits. The user may use setDeleteOnExit(boolean) to clear the cached files automatically after GOAL exits. Note that all writing methods may return before the data to be cached are totally written.
Author:
"Ming-Hsien Tsai"

      public java.awt.image.BufferedImage readImage​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      Reads an image stored in a cached file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file
      Returns:
      an image stored in the file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there is any error when reading the file

    • get

      public java.io.File get​(java.lang.String filename)
      Returns a file with a specified name in the cached folder. If setDeleteOnExit(boolean) was invoked with true, the returned file will be deleted after GOAL exits.
      Parameters:
      filename - a file name
      Returns:
      a file with the name in the cached folder

    • write

      public void write​(java.lang.String filename, java.awt.Image image) throws java.io.IOException
      Caches an image.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file for storing the image
      image - the image to be cached
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there is any error when writing the image

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all cached files.

    • setDeleteOnExit

      public void setDeleteOnExit​(boolean b)
      Sets true to delete cached files automatically after GOAL exits. Note that only the cached files created after this call will be affected.
      Parameters:
      b - true to delete cached files automatically after GOAL exits

    • create

      public static Cache create​(java.lang.Class<?> c) throws java.io.IOException
      Returns a cache manager for a class.
      Parameters:
      c - a class
      Returns:
      a cache manager for a class
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the cache folder cannot be created
